div.font:
1. User Input will be
sent to the backend

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 200px; margin-left: 195px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: nowrap;
div.font:
2. Embedding user input
and semantic search

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 200px; margin-left: 465px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;

display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: nowrap;
div.font:
4. Accumulates prompt template
with user input and relevant
chunks of information as context

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 40px; margin-left: 760px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0px; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0); line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: nowrap;
div.font:
5. Sends the customized
prompt to LLM and returns
the answer to the user

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 360px; margin-left: 480px;

div.font:
Splits and embedds the
external knowledge
in chunks
